Reviews.Title: FALSE ADVERTISEMENT
Reviews.Author: jnew05
Reviews.Content: I recently ordered a pink motorola razr v3. It advertised it as a refurbished at&t; phone but when i received it, it was for t-mobile!! i did notice that the photos purposely did not show the back cover so that i buyer could not see that the phone was for t-mobile and not at&t.;

Reviews.Title: Great company
Reviews.Author: Travis Scott Whiteley
Reviews.Content: There was a little bit of confusion on my part while waiting for phone to arrive. This seller answered all of my emails very quickly and were very courteous. As far as the phone, it was in excellent condition and the price was very good. I highly recommend this company for all of your cellular phone needs.
